name: x-twitter-api
description: Interact with the X/Twitter API: fetch tweets, search, get user profiles, timelines, post tweets, trending topics, and tweet likes. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: x_twitter_api
toolDefinition.description: Interact with the X/Twitter API: fetch tweets, search, get user profiles, timelines, post tweets, trending topics, and tweet likes. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: get_tweet (fetch tweet by ID), search_tweets (search tweets), get_user (get user profile), get_timeline (get user's tweets), post_tweet (post new tweet), get_trending (trending topics), get_likes (users who liked a tweet)

tweetId.description: Tweet ID. Required for get_tweet and get_likes actions.

query.description: Search query string (max 512 chars). Required for search_tweets.

username.description: Twitter/X username (alphanumeric + underscores, max 15 chars). Required for get_user and get_timeline.

text.description: Tweet text (max 280 chars). Required for post_tweet.

replyTo.description: Tweet ID to reply to. Optional for post_tweet.

sort.description: Sort order for search results (default: recency).

limit.description: Number of results to return. Varies by action: search_tweets (1-100, default 25), get_timeline (1-100, default 25), get_likes (1-50, default 25).
